name: ARK: Survival Evolved
description: ARK: Survival Evolved is an action-packed survival game set in a vast open world where you must survive against dinosaurs and other players. With a wide range of weapons, tools, and crafting options, you'll have everything you need to thrive in this brutal environment.

name: DayZ
description: DayZ is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world where you must scavenge for resources, craft weapons and gear, and fight to survive against zombies and other players. With a huge open world to explore, you'll never run out of things to do in DayZ.

name: Eco
description: Eco is a unique survival game set in a beautiful and vast open world. In Eco, you must work with other players to build a sustainable civilization while preserving the environment and fighting against natural disasters. With a focus on cooperation and sustainability, Eco is a must-play for fans of survival games.

name: Grounded
description: Grounded is an action-packed survival game set in a world where you've been shrunk down to the size of an ant. With a wide range of tools, weapons, and crafting options, you'll have everything you need to survive and thrive in this strange new world.

name: Rust
description: Rust is a survival game set in a harsh open world where you must scavenge for resources, craft weapons and gear, and fight to survive against other players. With a huge and active community, Rust is a must-play for fans of survival games.
